TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed ConsoleModifiers extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Represents the SHIFT, ALT, and CTRL modifier keys on a keyboard.

remarks.format:
## Remarks No distinction is made between the left or right SHIFT, ALT, and CTRL keys.
The ConsoleModifiers enumeration is used in conjunction with the <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> type.
## Examples The following code example reads a key and determines whether one or more modifier keys was pressed.
